quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), new logo of NMDC (National Mineral Development Corporation) has been launched, signifying NMDC’s commitment towards sustainable & responsible mining. NMDC had achieved the record iron-ore production of 40 MMT last year.At the global level, what is India’s rank in overall iron-ore production?
options: First
Second
Third
Fourth
Fifth

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has launched which of the following mobile applications as a one-stop repository of essential information for National Highway users?
options: Travel-buddy
Vaahan
Rajmargyatra
Parivahan
Yatra Sahyogi

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), first of its kind festival in India – ‘Festival of Libraries’ was organised by the Ministry of Culture at Pragati Maidan, New Delhi. Which of the following initiatives were launched during the event?1.      Bibliography on Demand (BoD) service2.      National Library Ranking Format3.      National Library Archives of India4.      Modernisation project of Delhi Public Library
options: 1, 2 and 3
1, 3 and 4
2, 3 and 4
1, 2 and 4
1, 2, 3 and 4

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), 132nd edition of the Durand Cup has kicked off in Kokrajhar, Assam. The Durand Cup was started in the year 1888 at Shimla by Sir Henry Mortimer Durand. Which of the following teams won the Durand Cup in the year 2022?

East Bengal FC
Kerala Blasters FC
Jamshedpur FC
Bengaluru FC
